about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the 'Sake Shop Owner's Wife' story from 'Obedient Women'.

Sake Shop Owner's Wife

HEROINE:
Itsuka Shinonome
An obedient wife is pleasured by a man who loves being serviced by her as well.

SYNOPSIS (Sake Shop Owner's Wife)


She runs a Sake shop with her husband.
She works with a friendly smile, sexy clothes and a cheerful attitude. If she wasn't married yet, every man would be trying to seduce her.
However, her business faces financial issues and she tries to fix things by making a big contract with a Japanese restaurant owner, Ryusuke.
She got married to a guy she had started dating when they were students. But, now she's confused, as she thinks that she could've married another, great man.
She loves to service people, so she always gives her husband good sexual service everytime they do it. However, her husband has gotten tired of it these days.
So, she instinctively desires a man who's genuinely happy with her service.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
This is a work of fiction.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128MB, Resolution 720p
